quest.name: Kick Some Asp
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Paramonos spies an opportunity to foist a perilous task upon an unsuspecting visitor.
objectives: Use the extra-thick aetheric rope on weakened ophions.
Deliver the captured ophions to Paramonos.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: How curious... A familiar bearing armaments? You must be special indeed.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: As it happens, I may have a use for you. Would you care to assist me by capturing a few ophions? In exchange for a reward of sorts, naturally.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: I should warn you, however, they tend to be rather uncooperative. Aggressively so, in fact. The familiars previously recruited for this task all met with most unfortunate ends. A terrible waste, but let us not dwell on such things.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: Here, take this aetherially imbued rope, and use it to restrain the ophions. Remember, I require living samples. They are extremely valuable, so if you must choose between their lives and your own...do the honorable thing and let them kill you.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: Just to be perfectly clear, failure is an option, provided you're prepared for the rather messy consequences.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: Have you brought the specimens I requested?

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: Well, well. To overcome such ferocious creatures and live to tell the tale... Your maker certainly placed great importance in durability.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: As for the ophions you've brought me, they will be delivered to the Akadaemia Anyder.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: Like the other creatures in Elpis, they are currently under observation, that we may determine their suitability for existence beyond these confines.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: Samples are carefully selected and sent for further study. If they are found worthy, they will receive official approval.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: Only then can they be submitted to the Bureau of the Architect.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: As even you can imagine, the evaluation process is particularly strict for voracious predators such as ophions. It would reflect rather poorly on those involved if they were to wreak havoc when unleashed into the wider world.

dialogue.name: PARAMONOS
dialogue.text: Not that it is any concern of yours. Here is your reward. Now, run along, would you?
